segment.source: The authors of this publication can not be edited because it has already been published.
The publication for this author could not be found.
Provide a formatted list of references for works cited in this submission. Please separate individual references with a blank line.
segment.target: Eman aurkezpenean aipatutako lanen erreferentzien formatudun zerrenda.

segment.source: New reviews have been submitted and are being considered by the editor.

Your submission has been uploaded and is ready to be sent. You may go back to review and adjust any of the information you have entered before continuing. When you are ready, click "Finish Submission".
Select the role that best describes your contribution to this submission.
Yes, I would like to be contacted about this submission.
Submit in any of the following roles if you would like to be able to edit and publish this submission yourself: {$managerGroups}
You must read and acknowledge that you've completed the requirements below before proceeding.
Thank you for your interest in publishing with {$contextName}.
Yes, I agree to abide by the terms of the copyright statement.
Please enter a valid CrossRef registration email. You can register your email for free on the CrossRef web site.
segment.target: Mesedez, sartu CrossRef-en erregistratzeko baliozko helbide elektronikoa. Zure helbide elektronikoa doan erregistra dezakezu CrossRef-en web orrian.

segment.source: Please enter your ISBNdb API key. If you don't have a key yet you can request one for free from the ISBNdb project.
segment.target: Mesedez, sartu zure ISBNdb API gakoa. Gakorik ez baduzu, doan eska dezakezu ISBNdb proiektuaren orrian.

segment.source: Please enter a valid PubMed registration email if you have one.
segment.target: Mesedez, sartu PubMed-en erregistratzeko baliozko helbide elektronikoa, baldin baduzu.

segment.source: Please enter a valid WorldCat API key if you have one.
segment.target: Mesedez, sartu baliozko WorldCat API gakoa, baldin baduzu.

segment.source: Please select one of the given citation modules.
Don't use by default (will still be available to the editor)
segment.target: Ez erabili lehenespen gisa hautatutakoa (editorearentzat erabilgarri egongo da oraindik).

segment.source: Internal error. A non-valid value has been posted for the 'optional filter' setting. Please report this as a bug.
segment.target: Barneko errorea. Balio desegokia jarri da “aukerako iragazkia” ezarpenean. Mesedez, eman errorearen berri.

segment.source: For best results, authors should be entered in the following format: Coleman Jr, D. (Ralf) Dr.
segment.target: Emaitza hobeak izateko, egileak honako formatu honetan idatzi behar dira: Coleman Jr. D. (Ralf) Dr.

segment.source: For best results, editors should be entered in the following format: Coleman Jr, D. (Ralf) Dr.
segment.target: Emaitza hobeak izateko, editoreak honako formatu honetan idatzi behar dira: Coleman Jr. D. (Ralf) Dr.

segment.source: Please enter a valid article/paper title.
Please enter a valid publication title.
Please enter a valid publication date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).
Please enter a valid access date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).
Please enter a valid season identifier.
Please enter a valid chapter title.
Please enter a valid conference date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).
segment.target: Mesedez, idatzi kongresuaren baliozko data (formatua: UUUU-HH-EE).

segment.source: Please enter a valid conference location.
Please enter a valid conference name.
Please enter a valid conference sponsor.
Please enter a valid first page (must be a numeric value).
segment.target: Mesedez, idatzi baliozko lehenengo orria (zenbakia izan behar du).

segment.source: Please enter a valid last page (must be a numeric value).
segment.target: Mesedez, idatzi baliozko azkeneko orria (zenbakia izan behar du).

segment.source: Please enter a valid total number of pages (must be a numeric value).
segment.target: Mesedez, idatzi guztira dituen orrien baliozko kopurua (zenbakia izan behar du).

segment.source: Please enter a valid publisher location.
Please enter a valid publisher name.
Please enter a valid ISBN (9 or 13 numbers).
segment.target: Mesedez, idatzi baliozko ISBN-a (9 edo 13 zenbaki).

segment.source: Please enter a valid Print ISSN.
Please enter a valid custom publication ID.
segment.target: Mesedez, idatzi argitalpen pertsonalizatuaren baliozko ID-a.

segment.source: Please enter a valid alternative link to the publication.
segment.target: Mesedez, idatzi argitalpenerako beste baliozko lotura bat.

segment.source: Please make sure that you always set a publication type. Currently supported values are book (for books or book chapters) and journal (for journal articles). Otherwise the citation output formatting will not work correctly.
segment.target: Mesedez, egiaztatu argitalpen mota beti ezartzen duzula. Orain, onartutako balioak liburua (liburuentzat edo liburuetako kapituluentzat) eta aldizkaria (aldizkarietako artikuluentzat) dira. Bestela, aipuen irteera-formatuak ez du behar bezala funtzionatuko.

segment.source: Please make sure that you set a valid title type. Supported values are 'abbreviated', 'translated', 'alternative' and 'uniform'.
segment.target: Mesedez, ziur izan titulu mota baliodun bat ezartzen duzula. Balio onartuak 'laburtua', 'itzulia', 'alternatiboa' eta 'uniformea' dira.

segment.source: Part of title ignored while sorting
segment.target: Tituluaren zati bat ez da kontuan hartu sailkatzean.

segment.source: Please only enter the initial characters of the title that should be ignored when sorting the title.
segment.target: Mesedez, sartu soilik titulua sailkatzean kontuan hartu beharko ez liratekeen tituluaren hasierako hizkiak.

segment.source: Please enter a valid part number.
segment.target: Mesedez, sartu zatiaren zenbaki baliodun bat.

segment.source: Please enter a valid part name.
segment.target: Mesedez, sartu zatiaren izen baliodun bat.

segment.source: Please make sure that you set a valid name type. Supported values are 'personal', 'corporate' and 'conference'.
segment.target: Mesedez, ziur izan izen mota baliodun bat ezartzen duzula. Balio onartua 'pertsonala', 'korporatiboa' eta 'konferentzia' dira.

segment.source: Enter each reference on a new line so that they can be extracted and recorded separately.
The following references have been extracted and will be linked to the submission metadata.
Are you sure you would like to delete this comment?
segment.target: Ziur zaude ohar hau ezabatu nahi duzula?

segment.source: Are you sure you want to clear the email log for this submission?
segment.target: Ziur zaude bidalketa honen mezu elektronikoen loga garbitu nahi duzula?

segment.source: Are you sure you want to delete this email log entry?
segment.target: Ziur zaude mezu elektronikoen logeko sarrera hau ezabatu nahi duzula?

segment.source: {$name} ({$username}) was assigned to this submission as a {$userGroupName}.
Are you sure you want to clear the event log for this submission?
segment.target: Ziur zaude bidalketa honen gertaeren loga garbitu nahi duzula?

segment.source: Are you sure you want to delete this event log entry?
segment.target: Ziur zaude gertaeren logeko sarrera hau ezabatu nahi duzula?

segment.source: The authors are now allowed to edit metadata when submission in stage {stage}.
The authors are now not allowed to edit metadata when submission in stage {stage}.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this galley?
segment.target: Ziur zaude galerada hau betiko ezabatu nahi duzula?

segment.source: Are you sure you want to remove this image from the galley?
segment.target: Ziur zaude irudi hau kendu nahi duzula galeradatik?

segment.source: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this supplementary file?
segment.target: Ziur zaude fitxategi osagarri hau betiko ezabatu nahi duzula?

segment.source: Typically used to identify the file format (e.g. PDF, HTML, etc.).
segment.target: Fitxategi-formatua (HTML, PDF, etab.) identifikatzeko erabiltzen da galeradaren etiketa.
Galeradaren locale hizkuntza-paketea zehaztu behar da.

segment.source: Please provide a valid remote URL (include http://).
segment.target: Mesedez, eman urruneko URL baliodun bat (sartu http://)

segment.source: No style sheet file has been added to this galley.
segment.target: Galerada honi ez zaio estilo-orriaren fitxategirik gehitu.

segment.source: If you wish, you may enter a brief statement about the access rights held in or over this submission.
No editor has been assigned to this submission.
Is this submission derived from another resource? If so, you may enter a URL or description of that resource.
Include this contributor in browse lists?
Add additional information for your submission. Press 'enter' after each term.
Submissions in several languages are accepted. Choose the primary language of the submission from the pulldown above.

The submission type is usually one of 'image', 'text', or other multimedia types including 'software' or 'interactive'. Please choose the one most relevant for your submission. Examples may be found at http://dublincore.org/documents/2001/04/12/usageguide/generic.shtml#type

segment.target: Fitxategia kargatu da. Sakatu jarraitu fitxategiaren metadatuak editatzeko.

segment.source: Please wait while your file is uploaded to the server.
A name is required for this item.

segment.target: Eman fitxategi honi izen erabilgarri bat

segment.source: You must enter a file name for this file

The name of the uploaded file resembles the name of a previously uploaded file, "{$revisedFileName}." Is this file intended to replace "{$revisedFileName}"? If so, select the file below. Otherwise, select "This is not a revision of an existing file" before proceeding.
Please select the file you would like to revise.
If you are uploading a revision of an existing file, please indicate which file.
This is not a revision of an existing file
Upload this file in my role as...
If you are submitting an Edited Volume, you should upload all volume chapters individually, under your role as volume editor.
After reviewing the assigned file, record any comments on the file below, and/or upload an annotated copy of the file (or another file).
Upload a File Ready for Publication
There are no files for you to revise at this time.
The submission must be resubmitted for another review round.
Submission has been resubmitted for another review round.
Waiting for reviewers to be assigned.
All reviewers have responded and a decision is needed.
New editorial recommendations have been submitted.
All recommendations are in and a decision is needed.

Users are assigned to stages of the workflow by user group. Any user assigned to this stage will automatically be assigned to other stages to which their user group has been assigned. This is commonly reserved for editors, authors and translators.
You are about to remove this participant from all stages.
You must select a user group.
You must select a user for the specified user group.

The participant you selected has been assigned to conduct a blind review. If you assign them as a participant, they will have access to the author's identity. You are encouraged not to assign this participant unless you can independently ensure the integrity of the peer review process.
Are you sure you want the authors of this submission to be unable to edit the submission's metadata at that stage?
Are you sure you want the authors of this submission to be able to edit the submission's metadata at that stage?
The page proof file must be checked as approved to be made Available. Do you want to approve it?
This file proof will no longer be publicly available for download or purchase. Do you want to disapprove it?
Assign an editor to enable the editorial decisions for this stage.
Recommend an editorial decision for this submission.
Select the files you would like to forward to the {$stageName} stage.
There was an error trying to assign the auditor. Please Try again.
A file "{$originalFileName}" was uploaded for submission {$submissionId} by {$username}.
A file "{$originalFileName}" was deleted for submission {$submissionId} by {$username}.
A file revision "{$originalFileName}" was uploaded for submission {$submissionId} by {$username}.
A file revision "{$originalFileName}" was deleted for submission {$submissionId} by {$username}.
A file "{$title}" had its last revision removed by {$username}.
"{$name}" ({$username}) was added as an auditor for the file "{$file}."
"{$name}" ({$username}) was removed as an auditor for the file "{$file}."
"{$name}" ({$username}) has completed an audit and uploaded "{$file}."
"{$name}" ({$username}) has signed off on the signoff for "{$file}."
You have been assigned as an editor to the submission "{$title}".
You have been asked to review copyedits for "{$title}".
You have been asked to review layouts for "{$title}".
You have been asked to create an index for "{$title}".
An editor must be assigned before review is initiated. Please add editor using the Participants list.
Select review files to share with the author(s)
{$reviewerName} has been assigned to review submission {$submissionId} for review round {$round}.
The round {$round} review by {$reviewerName} for submission {$submissionId} has been cleared.
segment.target: {$reviewerName} ebaluatzailearen {$submissionId} artikuluaren {$round}. ebaluazio-buelta ezabatu egin da.

segment.source: {$editorName} has marked the round {$round} review for submission {$submissionId} as unconsidered.
The round {$round} review by {$reviewerName} for submission {$submissionId} has been reinitiated.
segment.target: {$reviewerName} berriro hasi da {$submissionId} artikulua {$round}. bueltan ebaluatzen.

segment.source: Editor {$userName} has confirmed a review for the round {$round} review for submission {$submissionId}.
{$reviewerName} has completed the review for the round {$round} review for submission {$submissionId}.
Waiting for a response from the reviewer.
The reviewer declined this review request.
The reviewer has missed the response due date.
The reviewer has missed the review due date.
The reviewer has submitted their review.
This review is complete and the reviewer has been thanked for their contribution.
A production editor must be assigned before production process can be initiated. Please add a production editor using the Participants list.
A production editor must be assigned before editorial process is initiated. Please add a production editor using the Participants list.
Create a new review form element

If you leave this discussion you will no longer be notified of new messages. Would you like to leave the discussion?
Add a new reply to the discussion
There is new activity in the discussion titled "{$queryTitle}" regarding the submission "{$submissionTitle}".
You have been added to a discussion titled "{$queryTitle}" regarding the submission "{$submissionTitle}".
You must assign at least one participant to this submission before initiating a discussion.
You have been assigned multiple roles for this submission. Would you like to access the Author's workflow or the Editorial workflow?
You have been assigned an editorial role for this submission. Would you like to access the Editorial workflow?
This submission must be completed before an editor will review it.
Nothing has been published in this category yet.
The copyright year will be set automatically when this is published in an issue.
This version has been published and can not be edited.
The submission was scheduled for publication.
A new version was scheduled for publication.
A version was removed from publication.
The submission for this publication could not be found.
The copyright and license information have been updated.
All publication requirements have been met. Are you sure you want to publish this?
The following requirements must be met before this can be published.
The publication status has been successfully changed.
A declined submission can not be published.
The submission must be in the Copyediting or Production stages before it can be published.
The title and abstract have been updated.
Are you sure you don't want this to be published?
Are you sure you don't want this scheduled for publication?
The abstract is too long. It shoud be {$limit} words or less. It is currently {$count} words long.
